external_references.description: Nikita Rostovcev. (2022, August 18). APT41 World Tour 2021 on a tight schedule. Retrieved February 22, 2024.

description: [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) uses multiple built-in commands such as systeminfo and `net config Workstation` to enumerate victim system basic configuration information.(Citation: Rostovcev APT41 2021)
